website_summaries.verdict: This costume is suitable for infants as well as babies up to 24 months. It’s high quality and adorable, making it a sure bet.
pros: Costume is made out of soft material
Unisex design is great for a little girl or boy
Monkey ears stay perky on their own
Inside lining makes this even more comfortable and warm for baby
Zipper and snaps in back are convenient for diaper changes
cons: Included shoes are not very durable and will get dirty if toddler walks in them

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but had to be returned
customer_reviews.text: Super cute in the photo but when it arrived, I found the material to be super low quality :( and it was huge ( I bought the right size for a 6 month old and it was ridicoulsy big. As reference my baby is in the 50 percentile for her age). Nothing wrong with stuff being made overseas but the costume looked like counterfeit .. you know that look and feel of something that was poorly made? That’s how it looked , in my opinion. My husband wasn’t a fan either so it had to be returned :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 months 27 in length and weighs 16lbs and 13 ozs and I ordered a small if fits perfectly. He wore no clothes underneath just his pamper and he was sweating but we were at hm on a hot day just trying it on.. it's not Halloween yet so I'm hoping it gets cold so hes not sweating in it. The fur does shed a bit so heads up.overall we love it and he looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Raeann

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: We got tons of compliments, and my son looked really cute in it. Unfortunately he got too hot and we had to change him into something cooler. This would be great on a cold day though. The reason I only gave 4 stars is that the tail would not stay on, so we had to pin it on. Also, the wire in the tail was poking through the end, so we had to poke it back in and sew it shut.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because it LOOKED cute online but you really never know... this was PERFECT!!!! I was so pleasantly surprised! It was comfortable and the quality was excellent! We got soooooo many compliments! Since the quality is so good it’s thicker than most cheap costumes so it’s great for a chilly night. It can get a little warm if you’re inside and the heat is on but it’s perfect for normal temperatures!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's first Halloween. He's only 6 months old but very big for his age. I checked the size chart and determined I needed to buy him a size 12-18 months. It was a little long but fit perfectly everywhere else. He was the cutest chunky monkey EVER! And because it was rather chilly on Halloween night, it was perfect for keeping him warm as well. As you can tell, he loved his tail and didn't waste any time getting it into his mouth :-) The shipping time and arrival day were exactly as stated. I absolutely LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, warm and fuzzy...
customer_reviews.text: My son was very comfortable wearing the suit, but he hated the cap. The quality is very good and kept my son warm and fuzzy throughout. Oh so one issue, its fuzzy and the fuzz comes off easily. Which means, if you are not watching them (eg: he is sitting happily alone in the backseat and all quite) they are busy trying to eat it. So put a bib while you are not watching them,
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but very cute.
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive for cheap feel but it looked great. I ordered 6-12months for my VERY large 6 month old and it fit but there wasn't much room. He was wearing 12m Carters at that point. A true 12 month-sized child probably couldn't fit into the 6-12m size. I love that the feet were basically slippers (great for my non-walking baby, not so much for my toddler). Only 4 stars because: (1) expensive for cheap feel, (2) size seemed off, and (3) if your child will walk with the shoes at all they will be ruined immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JennKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: CUTE! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: my guy is 9 months old and 22 lbs. i bought this in the 12-18 month size and it fit great. very good quality costume, just as pictured, and i love how the ears stay perky on their own instead of falling back. i also like how the head, bodysuit, and feet are all separate pieces so that i can remove pieces accordingly when the weather gets too hot. the costume has a jacket-like thickness, so i am concerned about how hot he will get in this costume. overall, great costume, would definitely recommend, and can't wait to put my little guy in this for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume was great for my daughter's first Halloween. I bought a fabric banana and it just made the outfit. You can bend the tail, but you can't make it "stand up". It will hang from your kid's bottom, so bending doesn't really do that much. The one thing I was disappointed with was that after wearing it once it had ripped on the inside. I can't sew, but my mother-in-law was able to fix it for me. As for size, my daughter was just over a year and fit in the 12-18 months one. The head may need to be filled with something soft, but easily fixed. She's was in the 90% percentile in height.
customer_reviews.author: JenTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my son's Diddy Kong cosplay :o)
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I dressed our son up as Diddy Kong for Halloween this year and this monkey suit was just plain adorable. It totally made the entire costume worth it. Only one kid in our travels about the neighborhood understood the reference, so it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Thames

customer_reviews.title: My cute lil' monkey looked like a real monkey.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super adorable in this costume. We got a lot of comments from other trick-or-treaters who had to stop and comment on how cute her costume was. My son will probably wear it next haloween. Good quality costume though the velcro that holds the tail on isn't as strong as anything else the tail might catch on so keep an eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Millette

customer_reviews.title: he looked so adorable we got tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this costume for our son's first HALLOWEEN. Although he is only 7 months old he normally fits into 12-18 month clothes, which is the size that we purchased. My recommendation is to purchase this costume early, maybe mid / late September so that you can always return/exchange if you find the size is not correct. In all, he looked so adorable able we got tons of compliments from anyone who saw him in the costume. One note, the costume can get a little hot we we opened up the buttons by the legs for ventilation. Other than that, we all just loved him in this costume. Quality was great. Would definitely recommend. Just add banana :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gita

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice warm costume for people up North and was a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice warm costume for people up North and was a big hit. Only one we found where our kids face was meant to be the animals face like you'd expect vs a freaky, dreaded, double face. We couldn't very well have that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My son is 17 months, I purchased the 18-24mo. I think I could have gotten away with the 12-18mo, but this works great considering we still have a month to grow into as well as the warm suit he will be wearing underneath anyway.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Adorable - tail comes off easy, hat hard to latch
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be too hot but baby didn't mind it at all and she was adorable. The tail comes off easily. The hat is too small to be able to buckle under her chin comfortably (she doesn't have a huge head) but it stayed on anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Chani

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable costume for baby.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a cute costume and the fabric was soft and comfortable for our baby, which was our highest priority. The legs were a bit too short when we picked him up to carry him and the tail and feet had to be pinned on as the Velcro on the tail did not hold and the feet kept falling off. Because the legs were too short (my baby is normal height), would have been best to have dark brown leggings on to complete the costume look. The hat was comfortable for my baby and he kept it on all night. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Baby B

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent costume! It has a nice lining inside so it's not itchy at all. My son is two, and wore it all evening in comfort. No issues running around and playing. He was actually mad when we took it off for bedtime!
customer_reviews.author: Sihaya

customer_reviews.title: very cute costume
customer_reviews.text: super cute outfit, bought for my 23 lb son when he was 1 year old. the body suit is very warm and insulated, only bad part is getting it on as the zipper in the back doesnt go down all the way, the underside snaps for easy diaper changes, the feet are separate in case you want the kid to walk and wear shoes, the hat is probably the cutest part, its very hard for the kid to get off. my son actually didnt even try to fight it, very happy that we bought this outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but very hot and the snap broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: It was super cute; however, the snap on the back of the head part broke the first time we put it on and left sharp metal poking out. Also, since it wouldn't snap to stay in place, the bottom would ride up into his mouth and make him mad. It was also super hot and he was sweaty, flushed and cranky within a few minutes. We got some cute pictures out of it, but I think it would only work for a baby to wear for any length of time if it is rather cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cute. I took off one star because the seam came undone on part of the inside of one leg. Fortunately it wasn’t real obvious and he did get a solid 4 events out of it.
customer_reviews.author: JenniAK

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Costume is three separate pieces which makes it nice for LO who doesn't like anything on their feet. The hood is separate as well. The costume did not shed even though it is fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wirick

customer_reviews.title: Cute but some structural issues
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the costume was very slippery. Our son was 6 months old and just starting to sit unassisted. We sat him down for photos and he kept sliding around in the costume. He hit his head and cried. When we got upset he cried and the "fur" from the costume stuck all to his face. It was s super cute costume that was just kind of a pain. We also had to take tucks in the head area to keep the liner from showing around his face.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: A little short
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 10 month son okay. He is 30 inches and 25 lbs. lenth was a little short so when I carried him the legs would go up. Also the booties were too big. They kept falling off. But for a Halloween costume is was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS on my 8 month old!! The legs were a little short when sitting and being held but when standing and free they were perfect. My 8 month old is about 20lbs and close to 30” long so he’s big but not huge, not sure if this would actually fit him at 12 months. We got tons of compliments and it was all easy to put together, well made! My only complaint is the tail kept falling off as it’s just a tiny piece of Velcro. My boy was comfortable on a 60° day, it’s very warm and lined!
customer_reviews.author: rigatoni

customer_reviews.title: Cute! But kinda cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: My LO was adorable in this costume for Halloween! However, the material is scratchy, the booties were too large for his feet, and one if the snaps were broken when we recieved it. But it worked for the one night he wore it
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality monkey costume
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this costume, felt like it was one of the nicer ones on the market. A few small dislikes: -The costume was quite hot since its furry on the outside and then lined -Feet have elastic around the ankles which was a little too loose for my son -Head piece attaches under the chin with a piece of velcro which was kind of irritating to his skin and often showed in pictures -A little hard to zip/unzip but since you only use if for one day, who cares Would definitely recommend v the others I saw.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Love the monkey suit
customer_reviews.text: Great costume. My son wore this for Halloween and it was perfect because I expected it to be a cold night and it was. The monkey outfit kept him warm from head to toe and he was super cute in the process. The outfit itself seems to be pretty good quality as well! I liked that the feet were separate from the whole suit. My son got so many compliments on the monkey suit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween Costume
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for baby's 2nd Halloween and he was the hit of the entire neighborhood. The tail velcros on and off. Comfy and warm, fit accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume! Now, if i can just get my one year old to keep the hood/hat part on! My son is 14 months and 30" tall (21 lbs) and i bought the size for a 12-18 month old. My son is a little small for his age but it fits fine. It's an adorable costume that is warm and cozy. The feet aren't great for walking in- they're HUGE! They will look adorable for pictures and then i'll just put normal shoes on for walking around. I didn't want to spend a lot of money for something he will only wear one or two times, and this was perfect. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L Kreitzer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric sheds and doesn't breathe well...
customer_reviews.text: So cute - but it made our baby sweat like crazy (I didn't realize until we took off the hat that he was melting inside) So apparently the material doesn't breathe very well. Also, the costume sheds - I spent most of the evening making sure he wasn't eating all the tiny fabric fuzzies coming off on his hands and chew toys.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume
customer_reviews.text: It's just as adorable as I imagined. The only issues are that the tail isn't as long as pictured, unless maybe if you sew it to the back of a leg, and the velcro won't hold the tail on, but I believe I can fix that by sewing it into place in two spots.
customer_reviews.author: Oneasha

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 months, but at 21 lbs, he wears size 12 mos and has for a while. The costume fits perfectly. Although, I would say the hat is a bit snug, but he does have very big cute cheeks. The costume is so soft and lined inside. It has zipper in back but also snaps on the legs making for easy access to diaper for changes. The tail attaches with Velcro, and as others mentions, can be pulled off pretty easily. Not a big deal here though. Overall, love it and am glad we went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieF

customer_reviews.title: My lil monkey
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little monkey costume. She was comfy and warm in it. She just turned 2 years old and is talk for her age. After reading the reviews I bought the 18 month size and it fits perfect. We did lose the tail while waking around from picking her up and putting her down. I will sew on any Velcro tails in the future. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: SonSonTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Fun costume! Just a little large for our 13 month old
customer_reviews.text: We got it for Halloween and combined it with other costumes to create a Monkey King costume. We didn't use the body suit because it was too large, but used the head mask. We will use the full costume when he's older.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 1 year old and fit in this. He’s y’all for his age so this fit perfect. Just like most costumes this made him hot.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Better quality than expected. The tail detached with velcro, and it also has a wire through it to curl the tail. The ears stand up on their own. The detached feet are over-sized which makes the monkey feet adorable. The hood is detachable. There are snaps for easy diaper changing. It fits my 7 mo old 18 lb child, but quite a bit of room to grow. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Backers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's first Halloween - he was a week away from turning 1 year old so we bought the 12-18mo costume. He's a big boy - 97th percentile - and he has a little room to grow in the costume. The material is thick and really soft. I appreciated that the inside was fully lined, not itchy so we were able to just put it on him with just a diaper. We live in Central Texas so you never can tell with our weather! At first he was pulling the headpiece off, but once he looked in the mirror, he smiled and left it alone. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Torres

customer_reviews.title: Cute to me.
customer_reviews.text: This monkey costume is so adorable and seems really well made. Unfortunately, my daughter will not be wearing it this Halloween because she screams bloody murder whenever I put her in it. Two things that you cannot tell from looking at the pictures: 1) the neck of the costume come up pretty high, like a turtleneck, and 2) the headpiece is not a hood that buckles under the chin, it is basically a mask with a hole in it, and there is a snap to fasten it in the back. I would have loved for her to wear this costume, but apparently, as a 16 month old, she has made up her mind to be a princess instead.
customer_reviews.author: K. Papageorge

customer_reviews.title: I'm not putting my baby in a dirty used costume
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived looking used. There was dog hair on it (very obviously dog hair in no way a part of the costume). I'm discussed, I'm not putting my baby in a dirty used costume.
customer_reviews.author: E.b.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable. It comes in 3 pieces head body and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. It comes in 3 pieces head body and feet the feet fit him nicely were big in actual for bit nice around ankles stay on, head was a little big but was expected bought a large so it for over clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: It fit my chunky monkey
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 month old who has some thick thighs, so costume shopping has been a little difficult. However, this costume fit over his toosh and thighs with ease (I did buy the 12 month size)! Plus he's adorable in it! Its soft inside and out and seems to be nice an warm for our chilly Octobers.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth V.

customer_reviews.title: Precious but hot
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable! It fit perfectly but it is not made for Louisiana babies. It is not the costume's downfall that we live in the heat but it is fluffy and has an inside layer of insulation. I would not trade this costume for the world, my little monkey is going to be the life of the party. Thank you all so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: The quality was better than I expected after reading many of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The quality was better than I expected after reading many of the reviews. The tail never came off, and I was surprised that the head piece was as comfortable as it was (toddler never pulled at it to get it off). He was 15 months and pretty much exactly average height/weight, and fit into the size Medium well. It was perfect for a chilly Halloween evening!
customer_reviews.author: SF Bay Area Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Glad I read the reviews and put him in the smaller size. He's 13 months old, in the 45th percentile for height and weight, in the 6-12 months size, and it's still a little big. The 'feet' don't look like they do in the picture. Tail kind of droops. The 'feet' are also freaking huge. Like I think even if I put them over his regular shoes they're going to be falling off. But hey, it's a Halloween costume, it's supposed to be cheaply made, right? It's pretty cute, still, though, and will keep him warm, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K

customer_reviews.title: Adorable monkey costume
customer_reviews.text: Adorable monkey costume! Tons of compliments as too how cute it was. Only issue was the tail is attached with velcro. Easy to sew on but didn't since I just held my baby the while time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D'Haenens

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Adorable as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for my son's first Halloween. He's currently 5 months but will be 6 months by the time Halloween comes. It's a little long on him right now but I'm thinking it will be a better fit by the time he wears it in a month. He's about 24 inches right now and I purchased the 6-12 month size. The costume itself is absolutely adorable and I can't wait for him to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Halo5

customer_reviews.title: Maybe buy
customer_reviews.text: The footsie should be sewn with body suit. They keep coming off. And the glitter on the costume got all over clothes and furniture
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, The only reason why I give ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, The only reason why I give it 3 stars is because the tail the wire had poked through and it wasn't safe for my son to be walking around with a tail that had a wire poking out so I had to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Rips EASILY but other than that it was perfect! Loved it Would definitely buy it again if I needed to for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly get it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I love the quality. My baby is almost 7 months and fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monkey outfit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little monkey! Such great quality for the price! We added an outfit so he could be the flying monkey to his Witch Mama but it is super cute as the monkey alone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This costume wasn't cheap, but it was my favorite monkey costume, so I bit the bullet. It was SO adorable- a perfect first Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Fit perfectly on my 25" , 12.5 lb newborn :) I sewed on a flower near the one ear n it looked so cute on her as a baby monkey girl on Halloween. Can use th whole outfit together or separately as winter gear too! 2 birds one stone:)
customer_reviews.author: 0Kay Amazonnnnn

customer_reviews.title: Wow the quality on this thing is sad. The tail broke off there is a metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow the quality on this thing is sad. The tail broke off there is a metal wire which can even cut the baby!!!! We only used this for my boys halloween costume I have no way of contacting the seller about a return.
customer_reviews.author: jae lee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable for my one year old (who is large for his age). Has a little tail, cute little feet and a little tuft of hair in the front. It is lined with a faux satin and was warm on a cool halloween night.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: kiddo looks beautiful in it
customer_reviews.text: nice quality product. wish tail was sewn on . has Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: ELISEO ROJAS

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume. We bought it for my daughter for her first Halloween. I added a bow to her head so people would know she was a girl. :D I ordered the size 18-24 months and it fit her fine. She was a few weeks shy of being 12 months old, but she is a big girl for her age. 25 lbs at 12 months. I would say that whatever size clothing you are buying your child to wear, then get that size. My DD has been wearing 18-24 ever since she hit 11 months old. Super cute costume and the quality is great. I know we will get some wear of of this one. :D
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable and seemed pretty well made. The head was a little tight, but overall was very pleased. The feet, tail, & head piece were separate pieces. As my son can't walk yet, we didn't attach the tail as he was in a baby carrier. I don't know how well it would stay attached if a toddler was running around.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cutest monkey costume!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 11 month old for Halloween. He looked absolutely adorable!!! It was warm enough that we didn't have to bundle him up when we took him out for trick-or-treating. Everyone who saw him thought he looked so cute! We're saving this costume for our next child.
customer_reviews.author: 48nascargirl

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume. Super warm and cozy for the winter weather. Bought for my 18 mth old and it fits perfect! Has the onzie buttons in the diaper area so you don't have to pull the whole thing off. Only complaint is that I thought the tail stuck up in the air from the picture but it doesn't. The head is a little big.. Not too big that he can't wear it but sometimes it falls over his eyes.. Other than that, great costume and sooo adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Von Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: product is a little different then picture
customer_reviews.text: Pros - The costume is soft and is cute. Cons - The costume is not as dark brown as the picture shows. it is more of a litter color and the tail is not as long. Infact it is not long enough to curl up. Also the picture shows more hair on the monkeys head when in reality there is just pinch of hair. also the costume is in three parts (head, body, and feet). The costume is still cute and my son did look cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby boy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the costume. I loved It too. So adorable. It didn't even feel like a cheap type of costume either :-}
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Material Quality and Size Accuracies
customer_reviews.text: This was a little big on him? But it was super cute! Great Quality and kept my son warm in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality! It is super soft and pretty warm as well. I was very happy with this costume and it fit perfect. My only concern is that the bootie feet are pretty big and separate from the rest of the costume.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyE

customer_reviews.title: Monkey Baby too cute
customer_reviews.text: This costume was for my 7 month old son. He is in the 95% for height of his age so I figured it would fit ok but this costume was still big. In the end it still fit well enough for him to wear and it worked great! I would say the sizing should be for 9-12 month year old vs. 6 to 12 month. The head portion will fit any size, the feet and hands are tough to keep on. Still super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Lux

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality and warm too!
customer_reviews.text: Very very cute costume! Nice and warm for areas where winter sets in for Halloween. Just make sure you don't put it in the dryer. I accidentally put it in for about 10 minutes and some of the fur melted. It's still wearable but the fur was really soft. A lot higher quality than some of the other costumes I saw. Only drawback is we couldn't get the feet over his shoes so we just didn't use them.
customer_reviews.author: katealaska

customer_reviews.title: My monkey looked adorable on Halloween
customer_reviews.text: My monkey looked adorable on Halloween!! This costume is really well constructed. I chose very carefully as some costumes seemed flimsy, or looked better in the ad photos than the customer photos. I have nothing but praise for how this costume is made and how well it fit him. Best of all, it was a nice, warm costume for trick-or-treating. My son did not mind the head piece, or the feet. He never tried to take them off, so he must have felt comfortable. He is 9 months old, and fit perfectly in the 6-12 month size.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Hornigold

customer_reviews.title: a cute monkey costume for my little monkey!
customer_reviews.text: this costume is adorable! the quality is great and was exactly what i was looking for. the head piece doesn't sit like it does in the picture, its more flat and the legs were a little short for my son, i bought the 24 months because of his height...he's 9 months old and weighs 23lbs, 31 inches long. also, the bottom of the feet are orange, not the pale pink that is shown in the pic. overall i'm pleased with this costume and glad that i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette P. Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Precious - ideal for active boy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Halloween. Grandbaby wears it in cold weather. Size matched label.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is about to be 11 months old about 30inches tall. This fits her just fine. The material doesn't look and feel cheap. A little bit more expensive than I would pay for a kid's costume but it's her first holloween and she looked cute on it.
customer_reviews.author: ShENG

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: I really like the costume. Definitely warm only thing I didn’t care for was the tail. My baby’s 5 months old so no biggy for a tail but the wire in it was poking out. Not cool but still over all cute costume great for photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite costume ever!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 5 months old but in 99%for height and 85th% for weight. The 9month size fit her well with some room but the sleeves were a little long. Definitely recommend- great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hot.
customer_reviews.text: So cute! We purchased this for our daughter on her first Halloween. She easily could have fit in it this year also (18 months at Halloween). It is great for a colder climate, but if you live somewhere warmer during Halloween, you may want to opt for a different costume. The liner in it insulates it almost too well and it made our daughter a little sweaty (and we live in Michigan) so we had to take it off and put it back on when driving to various places for family to see her dressed up. Everyone loved the look of our lil monkey though.
customer_reviews.author: JnK Miller

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft. My grandson wears a 12 mo and based on reviews I ordered the 6-12 mo size. It fit perfectly. He seemed comfortable and didn’t mind wearing the head piece. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 week old son to wear for his first Halloween, and it is absolutely adorable.. This seems to be very well made, and the inside lining will definitely keep him warm in the cooler weather.. Bought the 6-12month as he is already 26in long, and although it's big now it will fit him much better come Halloween.. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ErinLynn514

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monkey costume
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was a HUGE hit at the Halloween Parade. Strangers were stopping us left and right to compliment us on his awesome costume (doesn't hurt that he's ridiculously cute to begin with lol). And it's nice and toasty if you live in a somewhat chilly (not cold) climate. Our baby had a onesie and some leggings on underneath and he was more than comfortable. The only thing we weren't a huge fan of are the monkey feet; they are kind of huge and cumbersome, and not that cute. We had our baby wear his little brown shearling boots instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best costume Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After buying and trying a whole bunch of costumes for my one year old, this one was the best by far!!!! Sizing is excellent, fabric was great! He actually liked likes being in it and doesn't want to remove the headpiece! The inside lining of the outfit is like a satin feel, keeps the coolness next to the skin! And quality is very very good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: cutest monkey ever!
customer_reviews.text: The suit fit great and our baby boy looked adorable in it. The only complaint I have is that the tail didn't stick as well as it should to the body. Our baby was 10.5 months, about 30" and 22 lbs. He didn't like the headpiece right away but after some distraction, he forgot about it for quite a while. He did remember later and tried to take it off again but he does that with any hats. Would recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Harmit Wadhwa

customer_reviews.title: So stinking cute😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand nephew, and he looks absolutely adorable in it! I bought a size 6-12mos for my 5 month old chunky munky. It fits him perfectly!! Love it♥️
customer_reviews.author: Punky Munky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durable stitching!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes, when you buy costumes online they are made of very cheap material that falls apart before your child even has the chance to wear it. This costume is made of of quality fabric. It is thick material and I can tell it will hold up with a 2 tear old running all over the place. Just wanted to give a shout out to this company for having customer satisfaction in mind when they designed it.; You Rock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley R

customer_reviews.title: Not infant-safe
customer_reviews.text: This costume contains parts that are not infant-safe. The biggest offender is the tail, which uses a thick gauge wire (8 or 10?) which is sharp and protruding from the end of the tail. My daughter had several cuts underneath her chin from playing with the tail. We could not figure out at first why she was crying but after we saw the blood on her neck, tracked the issue down to the sharp edge of the wire inside the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brayanov

customer_reviews.title: Nice cosutme for my kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit bigger than the size guide says, but was aware of it from reading reviews. still worked very well. It is pretty thick tho, wouldn't recommend it in warmer environments.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dahme

customer_reviews.title: the costume looks just like the product image
customer_reviews.text: the costume looks just like the product image. it is made of a really soft material. my baby looks really really cute in it. the two suck things are that the tail easily falls off because of the small round velcro that's used to keep it in place. also, there was a small rip on the side of the body. other than that...it looks really cute.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan n.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite costume ever
customer_reviews.text: Added wings so my daughter could be a flying monkey for Halloween. Still the best costume ever. Nice and warm for places that get snow.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie T

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft and really well-made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby daughter, as well as a lion costume made by a different manufacturer for her twin brother. Boy, what a difference! This costume had nice finished cuffs and edges, it was fully lined, and the fur was super soft and cuddly against her skin. Her poor brother's costume (made by Rubie's), had raw, unfinished edges, a rough, scratchy unlined interior, and the sparse fake fur came off in clumps and got everywhere (including in his mouth and eyes). I didn't appreciate how well-made this brand was until I had something else to compare it to. Next year, I'll search for Lil Characters costumes only!
customer_reviews.author: LizJ

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little Monkey around!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable monkey costume fit my very long 5 month old great!! We live in South GA and with the high "fall" temps he was very comfortable in this light weight outfit! He was the cutest little monkey around!!! I'm a little sad that he won't be able to be a monkey again.
customer_reviews.author: Gracen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable:)
customer_reviews.text: My son turned a year old in October so we did a Halloween theme birthday and dressed up. This outfit was super cute:) It was good quality for a costume and I'm saving it for the next baby. This looked really good in photos. It is a slightly warmer costume. If you live somewhere that doesn't get very cool in October, it may be too warm for a child to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Wish he could wear it again next year.
customer_reviews.text: This was very big for a 6-12 month size. Our son was 10 months and it was big on him but super cute. We got so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: product defective two times
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this costume. It arrived and the ear was sewn on backward. Had to send it back and ordered a replacement which arrived with the tail missing. So now I have to send it back again. Very disappointed and it is a shame because the costume is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sieben

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Hope for cool weather BC it is toasty!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jelley

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive all parts of the costume
customer_reviews.text: I received the costume but it was missing the hood that has the monkey ears, not much of a costume without that. I contacted them and a new one is on the way- I will update my review if I receive a full costume of good quality. We are just lucky that we ordered the costume with plenty of time to spare before any of our Halloween events.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gould

customer_reviews.title: Good but too big
customer_reviews.text: Love it~ it feels comfortable and nice. It's too large and my baby won't walk or stand with it, but he likes to watch me put the hat on.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Its a very warm outfit I didn't have to put anything but a onsey on under the Halloween costume.. very cute! and soft to the touch. My 1 year old didn't even mind wearing the hat! overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Charles Solon

customer_reviews.title: Maybe once he has an outfit on under it it will fit a bit better. But just FYI a very large costume
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the 6-12 month size based on reviews. I got it yesterday and it is HUGE! My son is 8 months and almost 20 lbs. and 28 inches. Unless I was sent the 12-18 month instead, this runs really, really big. Maybe once he has an outfit on under it it will fit a bit better. But just FYI a very large costume.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: A Halloween Treat!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was precious, well made, and a perfect fit (28 lbs & 32", I ordered an 18-24 mths). I also felt the price was acceptable for the quality. The material was thick enough that my son was warm without a jacket on a chilly Halloween night. We were given tons of compliments for how cute he looked.
customer_reviews.author: DCG0417

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume! My son wore it for his 1st halloween. We dressed my daughter in it two years later for her firat halloween as well. It is warm, and just adorable!
customer_reviews.author: H Ham

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love incharacter costumes
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old wore this for Halloween and it was so cute on him! Absolutely love incharacter costumes. The year before he was a lion by incharacter and I will always use them for Halloween costumes now.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Costume
customer_reviews.text: I lover everything about this costume. Its perfect to fit a winter jacket under and still look adorable. The only thing we had trouble with was the feet are a little stiff and want to slip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: It for my daughter perfectly. My daughter was only 3-months old but she's bigger than the average so we bought the next size up and it was a little big but it worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old loves this costume even though she thinks she's a bear wearing it. It was big in her but it made it look more adorable. It's machine washable. We washed it after opening and the costume looked the same. The material is soft and kept her warm. The feet have grips so they can walk around without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Guempel Family

product_meta.title: Fun World InCharacter Baby Lil' Monkey Costume
product_meta.description: Lined zippered bodysuit with attached tail and snap leg closures for easy diaper change; slip-on booties with skid resistant bottoms (booties for indoor use only) and hood with ears.
feature_bullets: Includes: Lined zippered bodysuit with leg snaps for easy diaper change, attached tail, hood with ears, plus slip-on booties with skid resistant bottoms.
